title: Aatrox Q
body: This bug happened twice in one game, so I think it should be pretty easily replicated. I was playing as Yorick into an Aatrox, there were two instances where this bug happened. I don't believe that the items we had mattered because it happened pretty early on and then again 5-10 min later. The aatrox tried to preemptively Q out of Yorick's W before it formed, and instead of traveling, Aatrox just floated up and then came back down. If needed I have a replay of the game.

replies.body: Yorick's W has a knockback component on it, which is knocking Aatrox out of his Q. This is intended behavior.

hmm, it seems kind of off both mechanically and visually, Aatrox floats up real slow and high which looks unusual and like a bug, and if it knocks back I don't think it should last like 1.5-2.5 seconds right? That's really long for canceling his initial Q cast.
